bullets: Initially contracted through Insight Global, converted to full-time February 2024. Responsiblities remained consistent.
Designed and authored new capabilities and features using C++ in an Agile environment.
Redesigned and re-implemented redundant fail-over critical systems.
Investigated and implemented various software fixes to mission critical systems.
Produced automated python and bash scripts to expedite development and release processes.
Lead efforts to update C++ and python code for required system upgrades.
Lead team unit test development and implementation for critical systems.
Authored Link 16 software capabilities including software design, implementation, unit testing, and integration testing.
Managed and prioritized work for a team of 13 engineers based upon customer needs and capacity.
Prepared and presented PI plans to management based upon priorities, capacity, dependencies, and stakeholders.
Executed test driven development for multiple Link 16 capabilities to ensure proper test coverage and software quality.
Generated test plans covering positive, negative, off-nominal, and edge case verification based upon system design.
Identified software issues and generated system and pilot impact reports for use in risk assessment.
Investigated and authored software fixes for numerous capabilities, from real jet flights to a variety of test facilities.
Collaborated with design engineers to ensure full design coverage of capabilities and identify any off-nominal cases.
Authored an application to automate performance report generation of MI series GPU compute models.
Designed in a modular and scalable fashion for future GPU developments in all areas of functionality.
Automated collection, parsing, and interpolations for RocProfiler silicon chips and performance reports.
Generated high-level GPU metric data based on low level performance metrics and knowledge of GPU architecture.
Drafted various reports and documentation for the continuation of the project and technical maintenance.
Facilitated comprehension of fundamental physics, mathematics, and engineering concepts of fellow students.
Communicated technical standards, helping students of various levels meet faculty and professional expectations.
Developed a suite of Python tools that save over 1 year of labor annually.
Performed several audits verifying intellectual property compliance with Department of Energy standards.
Prepared a variety of technical documentation for Office of Science use, circulated to other National Laboratories.
